alert.note: Alert for Norton (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 14 at 1:47PM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Norton County through 215 PM CDT... At 146 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 5 miles northwest of Almena, or 10 miles northeast of Norton, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Almena around 200 PM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
